name: Midnight Crisis (Chumpodile)
description:
MIDNIGHT CRISIS

Can you take a shit? Find out in this exciting new esport. 
(put a better description here later

made in 48 hours for the 2018 Sarasota Game Jam at Ringling College of art and design. 
The theme was "Middle"

Created by:

Jasleen Reshi - 3D Modelling/Sounds/Music/Set Dressing/Lighting

Nikki Azzopardi - 3D Modelling/Sounds/Music/Set Dressing/Lighting

Sam McCollum - Character Modelling/Particle Effects/Sky Stuff/Misc Programming

Collin Coviello - Main Menu Render/3D Modelling/Sky Stuff/Bear Modeller 

SungHo Kim - Lead Programmer/Level Setup

Music from KillerTracks production music 
Please don't sue us we aren't charging for the game

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Escape - Quit game

Mouse - Move camera

SECRET CONTROLS

Z - Die
